channel.title: Posts on Matt Daines
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Matt Daines

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo hosted on Github Pages
item.description: The site you’re reading now is hosted on Github for free, powered by Github Pages, Hugo (a static site generator) and Jimmy’s Stack Theme. This post will describe how to achieve either the same or similar thing for yourself!

item.title: Building DevTest Labs ARM Template Policies
item.description: I’ve recently been ARM templating again! In this article I’ll go through how I’ve templated a relatively troublesome resource: Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/policysets/policies. The documentation for this resource type is quite scarce so I figured I’d try figure out how to template at least some of the policies. Maybe you’ll find something useful.
